Corporate earnings deterioration in financials and enterprise software contradicting market strength

Platform security vulnerabilities threatening institutional crypto adoption timing

analysis.intraday_levels: SPY testing $700 Call Wall resistance (146k OI active hedging barrier), support at Max Pain $684. QQQ facing $620 immediate resistance (33k OI), support at $619 Max Pain. VIX 13.77 favors continued upside into holiday close.

QQQ $640 Call Wall caps upside (35k OI), $590 Put Wall strong support (164k OI). Watch for year-end consolidation between Max Pain and Call Walls.
